title_long: Necessary Dreams: Ambition in Women's Changing Lives
summary: Despite the huge advances women have made in recent decades, their ambitions are still undermined in subtle ways. Parents, teachers, bosses, and institutions all give less encouragement to women than men, and women still grow up believing that they must defer to men in order be seen as feminine. title: Necessary Dreams
